name: The Shawshank Redemption
cast: Tim Robbins,Morgan Freeman,Bob Gunton,William Sadler,Clancy Brown
synopsis: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
awards: Nominated for 7 Oscars. Another 21 wins & 36 nominations.

name: The Godfather
cast: Marlon Brando,Al Pacino,James Caan,Richard S. Castellano,Robert Duvall
synopsis: The Godfather follows Vito Corleone, Don of the Corleone family, as he passes the mantel to his unwilling son, Michael.

name: The Dark Knight
cast: Christian Bale,Heath Ledger,Aaron Eckhart,Michael Caine,Maggie Gyllenhaal
synopsis: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

cast: Al Pacino,Robert Duvall,Diane Keaton,Robert De Niro,John Cazale
synopsis: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

synopsis: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

cast: Tim Roth,Amanda Plummer,Laura Lovelace,John Travolta,Samuel L. Jackson
synopsis: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

name: Schindler's List
cast: Liam Neeson,Ben Kingsley,Ralph Fiennes,Caroline Goodall,Jonathan Sagall
synopsis: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

cast: Edward Norton,Brad Pitt,Meat Loaf,Zach Grenier,Richmond Arquette
synopsis: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

cast: Alan Howard,Noel Appleby,Sean Astin,Sala Baker,Sean Bean
synopsis: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Forrest Gump
cast: Tom Hanks,Rebecca Williams,Sally Field,Michael Conner Humphreys,Harold G. Herthum
synopsis: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
cast: Bruce Allpress,Sean Astin,John Bach,Sala Baker,Cate Blanchett
synopsis: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

name: The Matrix
cast: Keanu Reeves,Laurence Fishburne,Carrie-Anne Moss,Hugo Weaving,Gloria Foster
synopsis: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

name: Goodfellas
cast: Robert De Niro,Ray Liotta,Joe Pesci,Lorraine Bracco,Paul Sorvino
synopsis: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.

name: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
cast: Mark Hamill,Harrison Ford,Carrie Fisher,Billy Dee Williams,Anthony Daniels
synopsis: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

name: Parasite
cast: Kang-ho Song,Sun-kyun Lee,Yeo-jeong Cho,Woo-sik Choi,So-dam Park
synopsis: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: Interstellar
cast: Ellen Burstyn,Matthew McConaughey,Mackenzie Foy,John Lithgow,Timothée Chalamet
synopsis: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

cast: Rumi Hiiragi,Miyu Irino,Mari Natsuki,Takashi Naitô,Yasuko Sawaguchi
synopsis: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

cast: Tom Hanks,Tom Sizemore,Edward Burns,Barry Pepper,Adam Goldberg
synopsis: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: The Green Mile
cast: Tom Hanks,David Morse,Bonnie Hunt,Michael Clarke Duncan,James Cromwell
synopsis: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

name: Life Is Beautiful
cast: Roberto Benigni,Nicoletta Braschi,Giorgio Cantarini,Giustino Durano,Sergio Bini Bustric
synopsis: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

name: Seven
cast: Morgan Freeman,Andrew Kevin Walker,Daniel Zacapa,Brad Pitt,Gwyneth Paltrow
synopsis: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 29 wins & 42 nominations.

name: The Silence of the Lambs
cast: Jodie Foster,Lawrence A. Bonney,Kasi Lemmons,Lawrence T. Wrentz,Scott Glenn
synopsis: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
cast: Mark Hamill,Harrison Ford,Carrie Fisher,Peter Cushing,Alec Guinness
synopsis: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

name: The Departed
cast: Leonardo DiCaprio,Matt Damon,Jack Nicholson,Mark Wahlberg,Martin Sheen
synopsis: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

name: Gladiator
cast: Russell Crowe,Joaquin Phoenix,Connie Nielsen,Oliver Reed,Richard Harris
synopsis: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: American History X
cast: Edward Norton,Edward Furlong,Beverly D'Angelo,Jennifer Lien,Ethan Suplee
synopsis: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 14 nominations.

name: The Usual Suspects
cast: Stephen Baldwin,Gabriel Byrne,Benicio Del Toro,Kevin Pollak,Kevin Spacey
synopsis: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

name: Leon
cast: Jean Reno,Gary Oldman,Natalie Portman,Danny Aiello,Peter Appel
synopsis: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

name: The Lion King
cast: Rowan Atkinson,Matthew Broderick,Niketa Calame-Harris,Jim Cummings,Whoopi Goldberg
synopsis: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger,Linda Hamilton,Edward Furlong,Robert Patrick,Earl Boen
synopsis: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten-year-old son John from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

name: Back to the Future
cast: Michael J. Fox,Christopher Lloyd,Lea Thompson,Crispin Glover,Thomas F. Wilson
synopsis: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
cast: Shameik Moore,Jake Johnson,Hailee Steinfeld,Mahershala Ali,Brian Tyree Henry
synopsis: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

name: Avengers: Endgame
cast: Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Evans,Mark Ruffalo,Chris Hemsworth,Scarlett Johansson
synopsis: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 70 wins & 125 nominations.

name: Avengers: Infinity War
cast: Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Hemsworth,Mark Ruffalo,Chris Evans,Scarlett Johansson
synopsis: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.
awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 46 wins & 78 nominations.

name: Coco
cast: Anthony Gonzalez,Gael García Bernal,Benjamin Bratt,Alanna Ubach,Renee Victor
synopsis: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

cast: Jamie Foxx,Christoph Waltz,Leonardo DiCaprio,Kerry Washington,Samuel L. Jackson
synopsis: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

cast: Christian Bale,Gary Oldman,Tom Hardy,Joseph Gordon-Levitt,Anne Hathaway
synopsis: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.
awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 38 wins & 102 nominations.

name: 3 Idiots
cast: Aamir Khan,Madhavan,Sharman Joshi,Kareena Kapoor,Boman Irani
synopsis: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

synopsis: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

name: Escape Room 2

Six people unwillingly find themselves locked in another series of escape rooms, slowly uncovering what they have in common to survive. Joining forces with two of the original survivors, they soon discover they've all played the game...

cast: John Cusack,Amanda Peet,Chiwetel Ejiofor,Thandiwe Newton,Oliver Platt

cast: Dan Aykroyd,Ned Beatty,John Belushi,Lorraine Gary,Murray Hamilton

awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 10 wins & 23 nominations.

synopsis: A young woman with a childish voice travels to Africa looking for her missing archaeologist father, and stumbles into a strange subterranean civilization.

name: Doogal
cast: Daniel Tay,Jimmy Fallon,Christian M Garland,Jon Stewart,Whoopi Goldberg
synopsis: A talking dog and his friends fight to stop an evil wizard.

name: BloodRayne
cast: Kristanna Loken,Michael Madsen,Matthew Davis,Will Sanderson,Geraldine Chaplin
synopsis: In the eighteenth century, a vampire escapes from the freak show, in which she once participated, and teams up with a group of vampire slayers to kill the man who raped her mother.

name: Abraxas, Guardian of the Universe
cast: Jesse Ventura,Sven-Ole Thorsen,Damian Lee,Jerry Levitan,Marjorie Bransfield
synopsis: An alien "policeman" arrives on Earth to apprehend a renegade of his own race who impregnates a woman with a potentially destructive mutant embryo.

name: Meet the Spartans
cast: Sean Maguire,Carmen Electra,Ken Davitian,Kevin Sorbo,Diedrich Bader
synopsis: A spoof of 300 (2006) and many other movies, TV series/shows/commercials, video games and celebrities. King Leonidas of Sparta and his army of 12 go to war against Xerxes of Persia to fight to the death for Sparta's freedom.

name: Date Movie
cast: Alyson Hannigan,Adam Campbell,Sophie Monk,Eddie Griffin,Meera Simhan
synopsis: Spoof of romantic comedies which focuses on a man, his crush, his parents, and her father.

name: Cats
cast: Robbie Fairchild,Mette Towley,Daniela Norman,Jaih Betote,Larry Bourgeois
synopsis: A tribe of cats called the Jellicles must decide yearly which one will ascend to the Heaviside Layer and come back to a new Jellicle life.

name: Druids
cast: Christopher Lambert,Klaus Maria Brandauer,Max von Sydow,Inés Sastre,Denis Charvet
synopsis: An entire nation's destiny lies in the hands of one man.

name: It's Pat: The Movie
cast: Julia Sweeney,Dave Foley,Charles Rocket,Kathy Griffin,Julie Hayden
synopsis: The comedic misadventures of a person of indeterminate gender.

name: Laserblast
cast: Kim Milford,Cheryl Smith,Gianni Russo,Ron Masak,Dennis Burkley
synopsis: A teenager stumbles upon an alien weapon, which transforms him into a grotesque killer.

name: The Garbage Pail Kids Movie
cast: Phil Fondacaro,Anthony Newley,Mackenzie Astin,Katie Barberi,Ron MacLachlan
synopsis: Dodger must confront the struggles of life as he is visited by the Garbage Pail Kids and intimidated by some older bullies.

name: Mitchell
cast: Joe Don Baker,Martin Balsam,John Saxon,Linda Evans,Merlin Olsen
synopsis: A tough, slobby, honest cop tries to simultaneously take down heroin dealers and a corrupt businessman who murdered a burglar, even if it costs him his life.

name: The Bat People
cast: Stewart Moss,Marianne McAndrew,Michael Pataki,Paul Carr,Arthur Space
synopsis: After being bitten by a bat in a cave, a doctor undergoes an accelerating transformation into a man-bat, which ruins his vacation and causes considerable distress for his wife.
